58//
60//
61#define AM_APOLLO3_MCUCTRL 1
62
63//*****************************************************************************
64//
66//
67//*****************************************************************************
68#define APOLLO3_B0 \
69 ((MCUCTRL->CHIPREV & \
70 (MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ_Msk | MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN_Msk)) == \
71 (_VAL2FLD(MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ, MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ_B) | \
72 _VAL2FLD(MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN, MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN_REV0)))
73
74#define APOLLO3_A1 \
75 ((MCUCTRL->CHIPREV & \
76 (MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ_Msk | MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN_Msk)) == \
77 (_VAL2FLD(MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ, MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ_A) | \
78 _VAL2FLD(MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN, MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN_REV1)))
79
80#define APOLLO3_A0 \
81 ((MCUCTRL->CHIPREV & \
82 (MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ_Msk | MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN_Msk)) == \
83 (_VAL2FLD(MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ, MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ_A) | \
84 _VAL2FLD(MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN, MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN_REV0)))
85
86//
88//
89#define APOLLO3_GE_B0 \
90 ((MCUCTRL->CHIPREV & \
91 (MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ_Msk | MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN_Msk)) >= \
92 (_VAL2FLD(MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ, MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ_B) | \
93 _VAL2FLD(MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN, MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN_REV0)))
94
95#define APOLLO3_GE_A1 \
96 ((MCUCTRL->CHIPREV & \
97 (MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ_Msk | MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN_Msk)) >= \
98 (_VAL2FLD(MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ, MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMAJ_A) | \
99 _VAL2FLD(MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN, MCUCTRL_CHIPREV_REVMIN_REV1)))
100

107#define AM_HAL_MCUCTRL_CHIPPN_FLASH_SIZE_N ((MCUCTRL_CHIPPN_PARTNUM_FLASHSIZE_M >> MCUCTRL_CHIPPN_PARTNUM_FLASHSIZE_S) + 1)
108#define AM_HAL_MCUCTRL_CHIPPN_SRAM_SIZE_N ((MCUCTRL_CHIPPN_PARTNUM_SRAMSIZE_M >> MCUCTRL_CHIPPN_PARTNUM_SRAMSIZE_S) + 1)

117//**************************************
118typedef enum
119{
120 AM_HAL_MCUCTRL_CONTROL_FAULT_CAPTURE_ENABLE,
121 AM_HAL_MCUCTRL_CONTROL_FAULT_CAPTURE_DISABLE,
122 AM_HAL_MCUCTRL_CONTROL_EXTCLK32K_ENABLE,
123 AM_HAL_MCUCTRL_CONTROL_EXTCLK32K_DISABLE,
124 AM_HAL_MCUCTRL_CONTROL_SRAM_PREFETCH
125} am_hal_mcuctrl_control_e;

137//**************************************
162//**************************************
163#define SRAM_NOPREFETCH_Pos 16
164#define AM_HAL_MCUCTRL_SRAM_PREFETCH_INSTR (MCUCTRL_SRAMMODE_IPREFETCH_Msk << 0)
165#define AM_HAL_MCUCTRL_SRAM_PREFETCH_INSTRCACHE (MCUCTRL_SRAMMODE_IPREFETCH_CACHE_Msk << 0)
166#define AM_HAL_MCUCTRL_SRAM_PREFETCH_DATA (MCUCTRL_SRAMMODE_DPREFETCH_Msk << 0)
167#define AM_HAL_MCUCTRL_SRAM_PREFETCH_DATACACHE (MCUCTRL_SRAMMODE_DPREFETCH_CACHE_Msk << 0)
168#define AM_HAL_MCUCTRL_SRAM_NOPREFETCH_INSTR (MCUCTRL_SRAMMODE_IPREFETCH_Msk << SRAM_NOPREFETCH_Pos)
169#define AM_HAL_MCUCTRL_SRAM_NOPREFETCH_INSTRCACHE (MCUCTRL_SRAMMODE_IPREFETCH_CACHE_Msk << SRAM_NOPREFETCH_Pos)
170#define AM_HAL_MCUCTRL_SRAM_NOPREFETCH_DATA (MCUCTRL_SRAMMODE_DPREFETCH_Msk << SRAM_NOPREFETCH_Pos)
171#define AM_HAL_MCUCTRL_SRAM_NOPREFETCH_DATACACHE (MCUCTRL_SRAMMODE_DPREFETCH_CACHE_Msk << SRAM_NOPREFETCH_Pos)

275//**************************************
277//**************************************
278typedef struct
279{
280 bool bBurstAck; // FEATUREENABLE
281 bool bBLEAck; // "
282 bool bDebuggerLockout; // DEBUGGER
283 bool bADCcalibrated; // ADCCAL
284 bool bBattLoadEnabled; // ADCBATTLOAD
285 uint8_t bSecBootOnWarmRst; // BOOTLOADER
286 uint8_t bSecBootOnColdRst; // "
287} am_hal_mcuctrl_status_t;
288
289//**************************************
291//**************************************
292typedef struct
293{
294 bool bBurstAvail; // FEATUREENABLE
295 bool bBLEavail; // "
296 bool bBLEFeature; // SKU
297 bool bBurstFeature; // "
298 uint8_t ui8SecBootFeature; // BOOTLOADER
299} am_hal_mcuctrl_feature_t;
